Search                                            Geolytics Neighborhood Change Database       Resource:     Link to resource     Title:     Geolytics Neighborhood Change Database     Description:     Neighborhood Change Database (NCDB) gives users access to US Census data from 1970, 1980, 1990 and 2000 at the census tract level, with the additional option to access data for all four decades normalized to 2000 tract boundaries. This lets you view and display data as if the 2000 tracts existed and all the data is weighted to these areas. Variables include population, household, and housing characteristics, income, poverty status, education level, employment, housing costs, immigration, and others. Export data as dbf, ASCII, shapefile, or mid/mif files.     Categories:     Population & Demography                         Tools                       Email          SMS This                                  My Workspace      Search History                   NYU Division of Libraries
